content: chimera -cuff lace pattern designed and crocheted by isabel salgueiro aka zzabelinha sintra 25/11/08 materials 1ball of faytale 4ply from patons 1 hook nº 3 3mm 6 bottons or pearls stitches *front post half_double_crochet fphdc wrap the yarn around the hook insert the hook from in front and from right to left around the stem of the appropriate stitch complete the half_double_crochet stitch normally **back post half_double_crochet bphdc wrap the yarn around the hook insert the hook from behind and from right to left around the stem of the appropriate stitch complete the half_double_crochet stitch normally *** picot-chain 5 single_crochet in the first chain instrutions cuff make 2 chain 20 row- 1 start in the 3 chain 2 chains as first half_double_crochet work half_double_crochet across the row row- 2 chain 3 as first half_double_crochet work in fphdc row- 3 chain 3 as first half_double_crochet work in bphdc row-4-20 continue with row 2 and 3 fasten_off note you can adjust the size to fit your cuff edge work in the lenght be sure to start work in the rs row-1 chain 8 *double_crochet picot double_crochet chain 5 skip a row single_crochet chain 5 skip a row * repeat more 5 times double_crochet picot double_crochet chain 3 double_crochet row-2 chain 3 *double_crochet in the first double_crochet chain 5 double_crochet in the next double_crochet chain 5 single_crochet in the end of the first loop single_crochet in the beggining of the second loop chain 5* repeat from * to*more 5 times double_crochet picot double_crochet double_crochet in the last chain row-3 chain 3 * double_crochet picot double_crochet picot double_crochet picot double_crochet in the first 5 chain-loop chain 5 single_crochet in the end of the next loop single_crochet in the beggining of the next loop chain 5* repeat from * to * more 5 times * double_crochet picot double_crochet picot double_crochet picot double_crochet in the next 5 chain-loop double_crochet fasten_off finish work in rs start in a corner to the bottonholes chain 1 2 single_crochet chain 5 skip 2 3 single_crochet chain 5 skip 2 chain 5 3 single_crochet turn work slip_stitch in next 3 single_crochet 3 single_crochet 1 picot 3 single_crochet in the 5-chain loop repeat more 2 times continue across the bottom *single_crochet 1 picot single_crochet single_crochet* repeat more 9 times single_crochet across the other side fasten_off sew the 3 pearls as bottones note repeat to make the second cuff but besure to make the picot to the bottonholes in the other side hope you enjoy the pattern iff you have questions please e-mail me
